title: ITV Exposure 2016 Islams Non-Believers 720p x264 AAC HDTV MVGrou
description:
Islam's Non-Believers

Sociopolitical Documentary hosted by Deeyah Khan, published by ITV broadcasted as part of ITV Exposure series in 2016 - English narration. 
http://docuwiki.net/images/1/10/Islam-s-Non-Believers-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------
Deeyah Khan investigates the lives of people who have left Islam as they face discrimination, ostracism, psychological abuse and even violence in the UK and around the world. In Britain, many ex-Muslims are forced to lead double lives and hide their true beliefs because of the stigma they face in their own communities. Deeyah speaks to former Muslims at risk of suicide, self-harm and abuse from their closest family members and reveals how some senior Bangladeshi British imams - mainstream figures in society - have called for the execution of atheist bloggers in Bangladesh.
